title: Check for duplicate name and date of birth (request)
description: Check if name and date of birth match an existing account.

new_account_check_duplicate_phone_and_do.description: Set to 1 to check for duplicate phone number and date of birth.

phone_number.description: Phone number starts with + sign and country code with digits

loginid.description: [Optional] The login id of the user. Mandatory when multiple tokens were provided during authorize.

passthrough.description: [Optional] Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the `echo_req` output field.

req_id.description: [Optional] Used to map request to response.
